title: FRAPS
body: WITH FRAPS I RECORD AND AFTER EW SECONDS ITS STOPS AUTOMATICLY. HOW I CAN RECORD CORECTLY WITH FRAPS?{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: look I downloaded and I started to record everything was fine but screen was black it recorded only black screen.

CRAPS.

Use [OBS](https://obsproject.com/), it is far higher quality, has actual configuration, and a fraction (2-3%) of the file sizes if configured properly.
It also has no watermark, lets you choose the output format, downscaling filters and quality, cpu usage, can also be used for streaming, can capture specific programs and windows only, disable mouse cursor, and many other important things fraps utterly lacks.
And it is 100% free.
